subject: Cost Methodology for Estimation of Highway Projects under BOT.
text: HTrrft 774ftq <THrf gferorot THn Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (asm 4ae7 3 rnTHr T7TT4) 454 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India WaA: Extn 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0i-5 & 6, Aqer-10, ETAT;, T faorif _ 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/218/2007-Admn: 08.12.2010 POLICY MATTER: TECHNICAL(70/2010) [Decision taken on Technical Division file no. NHAIIDGM(Raj )20  0/Misc ] Sub: Cost Methodology for Estimation of Highway Projects   under BOT. The MORT&H has sent a letter dated 04.11.2010 for evolving a   clear guideline for framing cost estimates of all BOT projects of NHAI The DEA has also requested for formulating a uniform Methodology for the same. In view of above, the Competent Authority has decided the guidelines to be followed by all   DPR/Feasibility Consultants  and  Financial  Consultants, which shall be supervised by all the Technical Divisions uniformly while framing and finalizing cost estimates of the BOT projects and sending to Ministry for approval of PPPACISFC. 2. The Detailed Guidelines are summarized as Annexure-I. 3_ This issues with approval of Competent Authority. ubeq (M.
